title: Don't wish you had Steve Irwin around when laning against Renekton?

replies.body: my childhood hero

Of all the TV personalities that could've went before their time...

I know this post was a joke, and I do think it's cute. But, only 2 celebrity deaths have every actually upset me, his and Robin Williams.
Robin williams....what a great actor. Brought me much laughter as a child.
And then a stingray comes and ganks top....
Enter definitely not Renekton. Renekton in a stingray costume to scare off/ counter Irwin.
Lol oh boy. Downvote fishing today?
Nah, he's just fishing for stingrays
LOL
What? Too soon?
:P
makes me think of that rumored champ based on the Viktor schematics in the battlecast teaser arts
Danger, danger, danger....

> [{quoted}](name=revliledpembroke,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NEgyXBKE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-10T21:48:59.596+0000)
>
> Danger, danger, danger....

I'm on top of the world!
[God Bless](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tE1HDSipRxU)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2owUI45FL0

God bless Steve! Great joke about a great man.
I think we need a wrestler champ with a steve irwin skin
outback garen skin
needs to be a champ that literally wrassles, if he cant pin renekton on the dirt and explain what a beautiful specimen he is, then its insufficient :P
I spit out my mountain dew. That was freaking great.
:D
Not a wrestler per say, but {{champion:44}} could use a new skin and it would be a good excuse to put him in shorts and a half unbuttoned shirt :p

"Wish you had Steve Irwin around?"

...yes :(
Aww man I used to watch The Crocodile Hunter so much when I was a kid :D
Such a legend he was one of my childhood icons.
